problemSolution.problemHeadline: Why Most Businesses Struggle with Web Design

problem1.title: Too Expensive
problem1.description: Custom websites often cost $5,000-$20,000+, putting them out of reach for many small businesses.

problem2.title: Too Slow
problem2.description: Traditional web design projects can take 2-6 months, delaying your ability to attract customers.

problem3.title: Too Complicated
problem3.description: Complex processes, endless revisions, and technical jargon make the experience frustrating.

solution1.title: Affordable Fixed Price
solution1.description: One transparent price of $990 with no hidden fees or surprise costs.

solution2.title: Fast 3-Week Turnaround
solution2.description: Get your professional landing page live and generating leads in just 3 weeks.

solution3.title: Simple, Streamlined Process
solution3.description: Our proven template and clear process eliminates complexity and delivers results.

whatsIncluded.headline: What's Included in Your $990 Package
whatsIncluded.subheadline: Everything you need for a professional, high-converting landing page

feature1.title: Expert-Designed Layout
feature1.description: A clean, modern, and easy-to-understand structure optimized for visitor engagement and conversions.

feature2.title: Mobile & Desktop Responsive
feature2.description: Looks great and functions perfectly on all devices.

feature3.title: Your Branding Integration
feature3.description: We seamlessly incorporate your logo and brand colors.

feature4.title: Content Placement
feature4.description: We'll populate the page with your provided text and images.

feature5.title: Contact/Lead Form
feature5.description: An integrated form to capture visitor inquiries or leads.

feature6.title: Clear Call-to-Action (CTA)
feature6.description: Strategically placed buttons to guide user actions.

feature7.title: Basic SEO Setup
feature7.description: Essential on-page optimization (page title, meta description) to help search engines find you.
